comments.text: Just for now I'll wait for Pokémon Day's Pokémon Presents where I believe we'll see something about Pokémon Pokopia that i'm not very excited for because Animal Crossing like life sim/village building games aren't for me, but because it's about Pokémon it would be fun so let's see will I get that game! There might also be Pokémon Champions what is a Switch and mobile game too so I hope and believe it will be free like Pokémon Unite, that game looks very nive it's like a modern version of Pokémon Stadium! But about of games that I really hope to see in Pokémon Presents theh're just Gen 10 Pokémon games for the Switch 2, but i'm not sure about that because Game Freak has been making Beast of Reincarnation what looks amazing new action RPG game that I really hope to see is coming for the Switch 2 too! But is there still some people in Game Freak that could been making Gen 10 Pokémon games too? The Switch 2 gives a lot of possibilities for the next gen Pokémon games! But if it's too early for them I would love to see Let's Go Johto games or Black & White remakes! February 27: Here we go! 🎉😊
